featureType.name: wq_plus
featureType.title: wq_plus complex type from a SQL query
featureType.abstract: wq_plus is a complex type derived from a LocationsXY datastore. The LocationsXY datastore receives a SQL query from where it creates the base "simple" feature type. Then a ComplexDataStore takes it as input together with an output schema and a set of attribute type mapping definitions to accomodate each attribute or expression from the base type to the output schema.
